metadata.title: CVE-2017-16232 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - negligible
metadata.description: ** DISPUTED ** LibTIFF 4.0.8 has multiple memory leak vulnerabilities,which allow attackers to cause a denial of service (memory consumption), asdemonstrated by tif_open.c, tif_lzw.c, and tif_aux.c. NOTE: Third partieswere unable to reproduce the issue.

criterions.comment: tiff: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
